methods.name: getLanguageCompilerSpecPair
methods.comment:
Get the language and compiler spec associated with an old language name string.
 If the language no longer exists, and suitable replacement language will be returned
 if found.  If no language is found, an exception will be thrown.

params.name: oldLanguageName
params.comment: old language name string

methods.name: createDefaultProgram
methods.comment: Creates an in-memory program with the given language

params.name: name
params.comment: the program name

params.name: languageString
params.comment: a language string of the format x86:LE:32:default

params.name: consumer
params.comment: a consumer for the program

throws.comment: if there is any issue creating the language

methods.name: createDefaultProgram
methods.comment: Creates an in-memory program with the given language

params.name: name
params.comment: the program name

params.name: languageString
params.comment: a language string of the format x86:LE:32:default

params.name: compilerSpecID
params.comment: the ID

params.name: consumer
params.comment: a consumer for the program

throws.comment: if there is any issue creating the language

methods.name: applyCmd
methods.comment:
Run a command against the specified program within a transaction.
 The transaction will be committed unless the command throws a RollbackException.

params.name: program
params.comment: the program

params.name: cmd
params.comment: the command to apply

throws.comment: thrown if thrown by command applyTo method

methods.name: modifyProgram
methods.comment:
Provides a convenient method for modifying the current program, handling the transaction
 logic

params.name: program
params.comment: the program

params.name: callback
params.comment: the code to execute

methods.name: createInProgram
methods.comment:
Provides a convenient method for modifying the current program, handling the transaction
 logic and returning a new item as a result

params.name: program
params.comment: the program

params.name: f
params.comment: the function for modifying the program and creating the desired result

methods.name: undo
methods.comment: Undo the last transaction on the domain object and wait for all events to be flushed.

params.name: dobj
params.comment: The domain object upon which to perform the undo.

params.name: wait
params.comment:
if true, wait for undo to fully complete in Swing thread.
 If a modal dialog may result from this undo, wait should be set false.

methods.name: redo
methods.comment:
Redo the last undone transaction on the domain object and wait for all
 events to be flushed.

params.name: dobj
params.comment: The domain object upon which to perform the redo.

params.name: wait
params.comment:
if true, wait for redo to fully complete in Swing thread.
 If a modal dialog may result from this redo, wait should be set false.

methods.name: undo
methods.comment:
Undo the last transaction on the domain object and wait for all
 events to be flushed.

params.name: dobj
params.comment: The domain object upon which to perform the undo.

methods.name: redo
methods.comment:
Redo the last undone transaction on domain object and wait for all
 events to be flushed.

params.name: dobj
params.comment: The domain object upon which to perform the redo.

methods.name: undo
methods.comment:
Undo the last 'count' transactions on the domain object and wait for all
 events to be flushed.

params.name: dobj
params.comment: The domain object upon which to perform the undo.

params.name: count
params.comment: number of transactions to undo

methods.name: redo
methods.comment:
Redo the last 'count' undone transactions on the domain object and wait for all
 events to be flushed.

params.name: dobj
params.comment: The domain object upon which to perform the redo.

params.name: count
params.comment: number of transactions to redo

methods.name: getUniqueSymbol
methods.comment:
Returns the global symbol with the given name if and only if it is the only
 global symbol with that name.

params.name: program
params.comment: the program to search.

params.name: name
params.comment: the name of the global symbol to find.

return.comment: the global symbol with the given name if and only if it is the only one.

methods.name: getUniqueSymbol
methods.comment:
Returns the symbol in the given namespace with the given name if and only if it is the only
 symbol in that namespace with that name.

params.name: program
params.comment: the program to search.

params.name: name
params.comment: the name of the symbol to find.

params.name: namespace
params.comment: the parent namespace; may be null

return.comment: the symbol with the given name if and only if it is the only one in that namespace

methods.name: debugProgramInTool
methods.comment:
A convenience method that allows you to open the given program in a default tool, 
 navigating to the given address. 
 
 Note: this is a blocking operation.  Your test will not proceed while this method is
 sleeping. 
 
 Do not leave this call in your test when committing changes.

params.name: p
params.comment: the program

params.name: address
params.comment: the address

throws.comment: if there is an issue create a TestEnv

methods.name: waitForScriptCompletion
methods.comment: Waits for a launched script to complete by using the given listener.

params.name: listener
params.comment: the listener used to track script progress

params.name: timeoutMS
params.comment: the max time to wait; failing if exceeded

methods.name: replaceService
methods.comment: Replaces the given implementations of the provided service class with the given class.

params.name: tool
params.comment: the tool whose services to update (optional)

params.name: service
params.comment: the service to override

params.name: replacement
params.comment: the new version of the service

methods.javadoc:
Get language service used for testing.
@return language service.
methods.name: getLanguageService
methods.comment: Get language service used for testing.
